        <name>Deactivate arrival schedules</name>

        <script><![CDATA[deactivateArrivalSchedules();

function deactivateArrivalSchedules() {
    WPLogger.info('Deactivate arrival schedules', 'Started fix script: Marking all arrival schedules as inactive without triggering any BR');
    var arrivalScheduleGr = new GlideRecord(WPConstants.TABLES.ARRIVAL_SCHEDULE);
    arrivalScheduleGr.addActiveQuery();
    arrivalScheduleGr.setValue('active', false);
    arrivalScheduleGr.setWorkflow(false);
    arrivalScheduleGr.updateMultiple();
    WPLogger.info('Deactivate arrival schedules', 'Completed fix script: Marking all arrival schedules as inactive without triggering any BR');
}]]></script>
